text: shan hwla' alkafirin fi dhalik kshan al fireawn aladhin kadhabuu mwsa, wshan aladhin kadhabuu rusuluhum min al'umam alssabiqat fahlkhm allah bsbb dhnwbhm, waghrq al fireawn fi albhr, wakulu minhum kan faela ma lam yakun lah fieluh min tkdhybhm rusul allah wjhwdhm ayath, w'ishrakhm fi alebadt ghyrh
